description: Retrieves information about the specified policy.

parameters.name: policyStoreId
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the policy store that contains the policy that you want information about.

parameters.name: policyId
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the policy you want information about.

nested_items.name: policyStoreId
nested_items.description: The ID of the policy store that contains the policy that you want information about.

nested_items.name: policyId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the policy that you want information about.

nested_items.name: policyType
nested_items.description: The type of the policy.

nested_items.name: principal
nested_items.description: The principal specified in the policy's scope. This element isn't included in the response when Principal isn't present in the policy content.

nested_items.name: entityType
nested_items.description: The type of an entity.

nested_items.name: entityId
nested_items.description: The identifier of an entity.

nested_items.name: entityType
nested_items.description: The type of an entity.

nested_items.name: entityId
nested_items.description: The identifier of an entity.

nested_items.name: actions
nested_items.description: The action that a policy permits or forbids. For example, {"actions": [{"actionId": "ViewPhoto", "actionType": "PhotoFlash::Action"}, {"entityID": "SharePhoto", "entityType": "PhotoFlash::Action"}]}.

nested_items.name: actionType
nested_items.description: The type of an action.

nested_items.name: actionId
nested_items.description: The ID of an action.

nested_items.name: definition
nested_items.description: The definition of the requested policy.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description of the static policy.

nested_items.name: statement
nested_items.description: The content of the static policy written in the Cedar policy language.

nested_items.name: templateLinked
nested_items.description: Information about a template-linked policy that was created by instantiating a policy template.

nested_items.name: policyTemplateId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the policy template used to create this policy.

nested_items.name: principal
nested_items.description: The principal associated with this template-linked policy. Verified Permissions substitutes this principal for the ?principal placeholder in the policy template when it evaluates an authorization request.

nested_items.name: entityType
nested_items.description: The type of an entity.

nested_items.name: entityId
nested_items.description: The identifier of an entity.

nested_items.name: entityType
nested_items.description: The type of an entity.

nested_items.name: entityId
nested_items.description: The identifier of an entity.

nested_items.name: createdDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that the policy was originally created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that the policy was last updated.

nested_items.name: effect
nested_items.description: The effect of the decision that a policy returns to an authorization request. For example, "effect": "Permit".
